name: Noche Buena Salad
description: This salad brings a little bit of healthy into an otherwise indulgent season. Think of it as a palate cleanser, with the earthiness of the roasted beets, the sweetness of the apple, and the acidity of the orange and pomegranate your body will be thankful for some light fare.
recipeIngredient: 3  Beets, medium, roasted or steamed (cut into slices)

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the chopped romaine with the rest of the ingredients, or arrange the ingredients on top of the lettuce.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss the chopped romaine with the rest of the ingredients, or arrange the ingredients on top of the lettuce.

recipeInstructions.text: To make the dressing whisk the orange juice, vinegar, and garlic together. Slowly add the oil and continue whisking. Season with salt and pepper. Pour over salad.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the dressing whisk the orange juice, vinegar, and garlic together. Slowly add the oil and continue whisking. Season with salt and pepper. Pour over salad.

keywords: mexican christmas salad, vegan noche buena salad
